item.title: How to handle a list of int and improve its display
item.description: Introduction In one of my project, I had to handle a list of runs and improve the way it was displayed. For example 10,20,21,22,23,24,30,40,41,15,18 should be displayed 10,15,18,20:24,30,40,41 Also, if a user add new runs to the list, using a dropdown list on the side, the list will be updaded as followed: if a number is already in the list, it will be removed if a number is new to the list, it will just be added Before showing you the code, here is how it works using a few examples
